name: MME - Escape from maniac
description:
Escape from maniac mansion is experemental action quest game. You can escape from maniac house, but be careful because around every corner you are waiting for the danger. You have to survive the real horror and nightmare, because a maniac has set a target to kill you. How will long you stay alive?

Help make our games more interesting and better! Do not hesitate to send your feedback and we will consider all your wishes, because we are creating a game for you!
